convertRules:
# have fun converting!
'def |' -> 'Definition|\n: '
'prop |' -> 'Proposition|\n:'
'lem |' -> 'Lemma|\n:'
'the |' -> 'Theorem|\n:'

'rem |' -> '**Remark**:|'
'obj |' -> '**Objection**|'
'def |' -> '**Defense**|'

# Selection Insert Rules
'"'  -> '"' + '"'
'<'  -> '<' + '>'
